name: Turkey Gourmet Skillet Dinner
ingredients: Roasted red pepper, julienned, about 2 ounces or 1/4 cup
1 ounce sun-dried tomatoes, about 5 pieces, julienned
1 medium zucchini, julienned like pasta, about 6 ounces
Herbs of your choice, such as parsley and basil
2 ounces freshly grated parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup

instructions.en: Soak sun-dried tomatoes in boiling water for 10-15 minutes. Measure and prep all ingredients.
instructions.sk: Namočte sušené paradajky do vriacej vody na 10-15 minút. Odmerajte a pripravte všetky ingrediencie.
instructions.ja: 乾燥トマトを沸騰したお湯に10〜15分浸します。全ての材料を計量し、下準備をします。

instructions.en: Brown turkey, onion, and garlic in a large skillet; drain grease. Season lightly with salt and pepper.
instructions.sk: Na veľkej panvici opečte morku, cibuľu a cesnak; zlejte mastnotu. Jemne ochuťte soľou a korením.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで七面鳥のひき肉、玉ねぎ、ニンニクを炒めて脂を切ります。塩コショウで軽く味付けします。

instructions.en: Add red peppers, sun-dried tomatoes, and mushrooms. Cook until mushrooms are tender.
instructions.sk: Pridajte červenú papriku, sušené paradajky a huby. Varte, kým huby nezmäknú.
instructions.ja: 赤ピーマン、乾燥トマト、マッシュルームを加えます。マッシュルームが柔らかくなるまで調理します。

instructions.en: Stir in tomato sauce and heavy cream. Add zucchini and simmer until tender.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte paradajkovú omáčku a smotanu. Pridajte cuketu a varte, kým nezmäkne.
instructions.ja: トマトソースと生クリームを加えて混ぜます。ズッキーニを加えて柔らかくなるまで煮込みます。

instructions.en: Add parmesan cheese. Season with salt, pepper, and herbs to taste.
instructions.sk: Pridajte parmezán. Dochuťte soľou, korením a bylinkami podľa chuti.
instructions.ja: パルメザンチーズを加えます。塩、コショウ、ハーブで好みの味に調整します。

notes: Makes 4-6 servings. Do not freeze. Use a zucchini that weighs about 9-10 ounces.
